[Agathion Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=2289) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Idyllkin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2284)

</column>

---

The harmonious magic of [Nirvana](/Planes.aspx?ID=20) flows through you. You can cast [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10) and [_calm emotions_](/Spells.aspx?ID=31) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
